description.narrative: The main objectives of the project are to: (i) respond to the critical term funding gap for SMEs; (ii) generate employment through resultant growth of SMEs and investment in productive assets; and, (iii) increase financial inclusion in Romania: improved access to credit and increasing the economic power of women would translate into improved livelihoods for a wide cross-section of society.

mailing-address.narrative: Garanti Bank Romania Adnan Ayman Head of Financial Institutions +40 21 208 9281 romaniafinancialinstiutions@garantibank.ro Novo Park 3 Business CenterF Building, 5th Floor, BucharestDistrict 2, Romania http://www.garanti.ro/

title.narrative: Summary of Investment Information - Anticipated Impact Measurement & Monitoring (AIMM) Assessment and Main Environmental & Social Risks and Impacts of the Project
